bug.author: negiyas
bug.summary: symbol lookup error when executing dl4j-0.4-examples on POWER with CUDA
bug.description: When I execute dl4j-0.4-examples on POWER with CUDA. It causes errors with the following error messages. I pulled and built the latest version of DL4J from the git. Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Dos.arch=ppc64le [INFO] Scanning for projects... [INFO] [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------ [INFO] Building DeepLearning4j Examples 0.4-rc0-SNAPSHOT [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------ [INFO] [INFO] --- exec-maven-plugin:1.4.0:java (default-cli) @ deeplearning4j-examples --- o.d.e.c.LenetMnistExample - Load data.... o.d.e.c.LenetMnistExample - Build model.... /shared/java-8-openjdk-ppc64el/bin/java: symbol lookup error: /tmp/javacpp655291853668108/libjnind4j.so: undefined symbol: _ZN9NativeOps16setOmpNumThreadsEi

comments.comment:
That looks like an out of date libnd4j On May 31, 2016 14:52, "negiyas" <denchmark-link:mailto:notifications@github.com>notifications@github.com</denchmark-link> wrote:
When I execute dl4j-0.4-examples on POWER with CUDA. It causes errors with the following error messages. I pulled and built the latest version of DL4J from the git. Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Dos.arch=ppc64le [INFO] Scanning for projects... [INFO] [INFO] [INFO] Building DeepLearning4j Examples 0.4-rc0-SNAPSHOT [INFO] [INFO] [INFO] --- exec-maven-plugin:1.4.0:java (default-cli) @ deeplearning4j-examples --- o.d.e.c.LenetMnistExample - Load data.... o.d.e.c.LenetMnistExample - Build model.... /shared/java-8-openjdk-ppc64el/bin/java: symbol lookup error: /tmp/javacpp655291853668108/libjnind4j.so: undefined symbol: _ZN9NativeOps16setOmpNumThreadsEi â€” You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/negiyas>@negiyas</denchmark-link> Can you rebuild with the latest releases of libnd4j?
